author: Wheest
message:
PR #33513: [docs] note mlir-hlo deprecation

Imported from GitHub PR https://github.com/openxla/xla/pull/33513

Closes #33472, by noting that the project will be deprecated.  Will reduce the chance of folk exploring the project without this knowledge.
Copybara import of the project:

--
f82b0101b6823094c9572d82c0e38d64bd1b7adb by Perry Gibson <perry@gibsonic.org>:

docs: note mlir-hlo deprecation

Merging this change closes #33513

PiperOrigin-RevId: 827888690

files.patch:
@@ -1,5 +1,9 @@
 # MLIR-HLO: A Standalone "HLO" MLIR-based Compiler
 
+> Note:
+> [this project is deprecated](https://groups.google.com/a/openxla.org/g/openxla-discuss/c/Mppuv1Edv1s),
+> and will be removed in the future.
+
 The code here exists in two places:
 
 *   https://github.com/openxla/xla/tree/main/xla/mlir_hlo:
